inventory.name: Drumming
inventory.description: You can easily record your own tracks, and jam out with this awesome drum set. 40 New Preset Kits, 200 User Kits and over 400 New Voices.Faithful reproduction of real sound and ambience recorded in a well-known studio .

inventory.name: Jewerly making
inventory.description: Spend your time creating unique jewerly. This type of hobby can even be monitized, or even add on to your wardrobe. Let your imagination go wild.

inventory.name: Photography
inventory.description: Capture the outdoors, create cool image. Possibilities are endless with this hobby

inventory.name: Cocktail mixing
inventory.description: Most people love a good cocktail. Mix and match and explore different tastes. Entertain guests with your new inventions

inventory.name: Indoor gardening
inventory.description: What a great way to decorate your home, and have fun in the process. Did you know that some indoor plants can even help clean the air? Check out this great hobby

inventory.name: Bread Making
inventory.description: Everyone loves to eat. Why not check out this great way to pass some time, and eat too. There are so many different kinds of bread; who knew?! And most of all , you can choose the healthy options since you are the one baking them

inventory.name: Sewing
inventory.description: Great book to get started! Learning how to sew has never been simpler! Like having a personal instructor at your side, this beginners guide teaches you to sew stitches both by hand and with a machine

inventory.name: Origami
inventory.description: You are going to have a blast with this one. Bend it , shape it, twist it. Create intricate shapes, and even use it for decorating

inventory.name: Knitting
inventory.description: You can knit sweaters, gloves, gifts, hats. possibilities are almost endless with this one.

inventory.name: Paint by number
inventory.description: This is surprisingly fun! You can create your own art at home with little or no artistic skills. Just follow the number patterns, get your brush ready, and off you go. Great and relaxing way to spend the time.

inventory.name: Costume making/Cosplay
inventory.description: How fun will it be to make your own costumes. Into cosplay? or love halloweens? this guide is great for getting started

inventory.name: Cofee Roasting
inventory.description: Love coffee? always wanted to get that perfect test and blend. This guide can get your started
